name: Maskey Consultancy Services
description:
Since 2012, we have been providing solutions to our esteemed customers from different business verticals around the globe.

MCS is driven by highly trained staff practicing unique customer-centric methodologies. Together, we offer an array of value-added solutions aimed at simplifying customer’s IT requirements. By increasing efficiency and optimizing the TCO while ensuring on ROI.

Making customized application of web and mobile is our primary strength. We use HTML5, PHP, Android, Cordova, WP, Yii2, Mysql, Material, Bootstrap, Jquery and many other technologies to help us build applications.

We are partnered with Redhat, Nova-store, Track, Ashtech, and Oxford to optimize our solutions. We take outsourcing jobs for development, digital marketing, remote support and permanent remote employee for technological work.

We aspire to bring innovative solutions to our customers.
